Package org.lwjgl.util.par

Class ParSLConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.util.par.ParSLConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class ParSLConfig
extends Struct
implements NativeResource
    Immutable configuration for a streamlines context.

    Member documentation

    • flags – one or more of:
      FLAG_WIREFRAMEFLAG_ANNOTATIONSFLAG_SPINE_LENGTHSFLAG_RANDOM_OFFSETS
      FLAG_CURVE_GUIPARSL_FLAG_DES
    • u_mode – one of:
      ParStreamlines.PAR_U_MODE_NORMALIZED_DISTANCEParStreamlines.PAR_U_MODE_DISTANCEParStreamlines.PAR_U_MODE_SEGMENT_INDEX
      ParStreamlines.PAR_U_MODE_SEGMENT_FRACTION

    Layout

    
 struct parsl_config {
     float thickness;
     uint32_t flags;
     int u_mode;
     float curves_max_flatness;
     float streamlines_seed_spacing;
     parsl_viewport streamlines_seed_viewport;
     float miter_limit;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParSLConfig

        public ParSLConfig​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a ParSLConfig instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
